parameters: Looking for some supplies? I've gotcha cover'd!
Ya won't be able ta Mine without equipping a \iw[21],
if ya start mining without one you'll have ta retreat.
I could ask you the same thing... \. \.
We need you to return to \c[12]Coral Castle\c.
\c[11]Lord Mikaal\c has tasked us to retreive you.
Retrieve me? What for, I'm on leave.
News doesn't travel fast to \c[5]Cliffgrove\c does it...
What do you mean \c[11]Arturus\c? What's happened?
Something tells me my leave is about to be over... \.
You could say that, \c[12]Coral Castle\c was attacked by the
Is \c[11]Mikaal\c alright? What of our soldiers?
I take it everythings ok now, right? Otherwise why would their
'best knight' \c[11]Arturus\c be here on an fetch quest?
\c[11]Lord Mikaal\c is alive and well. Our soldiers took a hit but
we have fought them off. It wasn't a full assault, but instead an Elite
Assassination crew. They were working with the \c[20]Beastment Uruks\c.
That doesn't surprise me... I knew the \c[20]Crimson Dawn Empire\c wouldn't
keep their promise on that treaty. They've always had a thirst for more power.
We need your help. You're the best pilot I know and we have been
Let's go, we've been ordered to mount a counter-measure against
...I want to help, but I have to finish what I came out here for.
What exactly 'are' you out here for? Our window of opportunity
grows smaller with each passing minute.
Help me find the artifact I'm looking for and not only will I help you
but the item we find will help to protect us.
\c[11]Arturus\c, I know we have little time, but this might be worth doing.
If we help him then he helps us. In addition we'll have something powerful,
Very well, we'll help you hunt down whatever treasure it is you're
currently seeking, but after that no more pit-stops alright?
Deal... oh by the way I forgot to mention the artifact I'm hunting down
If you haven't got your hands on some \c[8]Silver\c weapons by now
I think it would be suicide to enter that place without them.
\c[11]Olguin\c, I've not seen any of us wield anything \c[8]Silver\c.
There's no way I'm going to put \c[11]Tiana\c in a situation where
she is unprepared. Where can we get some \c[8]Silver\c weapons?
Well that brings us full circle to the reason I'm here.
We'll have to Mine up some \c[8]Silver\c to make our \c[8]Silver\c
There's a \c[8]Silver\c mine in the back of this town.
In fact \c[5]Cliffgrove\c was established due to the high
\c[8]Silver\c yield of the ground it was build on.
I've already made myself a \iw[93], and I've got a spare \iw[21].
There's also a merchant who works near the mine in the back.
He could sell us some extra \iw[21]s.
You obtained two \iw[21]s! (Remember to Equip them before Mining)
(You can check your current Mining Skill in the \c[2]"Status Menu"\c.
Everytime you Mine there is a 75% chance that you'll get a
Mining Level up! Higher skill will let you Mine stronger ores.)
We'll also need the Recipe Book to know how to turn the Ores into Ingots,
and the Recipe Books on how to make weapons and armor out of those Ingots.
Luckily, I've got them right here!
You Obtain the Recipe books for:
(There are many more Recipe Books that can be found thru-out the world.
Keep a keen eye out for where you can purchase or obtain these Recipe Books.)
Now that you have Recipe Books you can access the Crafting Menu from the
Alright, let's get a couple more \iw[21]s and mine up some \c[8]Silver\c.
Well, unless we want to go in unprepared I suppose it's best...
Now that you have access to more than four party members you can
switch between them using the \c[2]"Formation" window on the Menu Screen\c
and also by pressing the \c[2]Escape button and selecting the "Formation"
Drink from the crystal clear waters?
Let's yummy down on this water.
Let's yummy down on this water.
Drink from the crystal clear waters?
Let's yummy down on this water.
Let's yummy down on this water.
